text: Kamaghɨn, ia deragh gan, egh ia uan kuaribav konegh Gumazir Mɨgeimɨn akam baraghan aghuaghan markɨ. Fomɨra nguazir kamɨn God akar gavgavim gumazamizibagh anɨngi. Ezɨma me an akam baraghan aghua, egha gɨn me uan arazir kurabar ivezir kuram gitazir puvatɨ. Egha God datɨrɨghɨn uan Nguibamɨn ikia egha akar bar gavgavim e ganɨngi. E akɨrim ragh a gasaragh egh e uan arazir kuramɨn ivezir kuram gitavɨragham, o? Bar puvatɨ.
